tossup_question: 32) BIOLOGY  Which of the following best describes the process of the steps of fermentation following glycolysis
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Generating ATP from Oxidative phosphorylation 
X) Generating ATP from substrate-level phosphorylation
Y) Regeneration of NAD+ for subsequent glycolysis 
Z) Creating substances that can be passed to other metabolic pathways
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Y) Regeneration of NAD+ for subsequent glycolysis
bonus_question: 32) BIOLOGY   What is the most common dye that is used for staining proteins during gel electrophoresis
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Coomassie blue
X) GelRed
Y) Ethidium Bromide
Z) TMEDA
